column1: • Moving Thunderbird Data to a New Computer\
Tiimtorɗe "New to Firefox" ndee woodaani walla alaa baylita jaɓangal.\
So ahoriima yiyde jaabawol coklu-ɗaa, Renndo amen walwalɓe ena kebii wallude-ma yiytude feere. naamnal maa ɗoo.\
Tiimtorɗe "Privacy & Security topic" ndee woodaani walla alaa baylita jaɓangal.\
Tiimtorɗe "Using Firefox topic" ndee woodaani walla alaa baylita jaɓangal.\
Tiimtorɗe "Customizing Firefox topic" ndee woodaani walla alaa baylita jaɓangal.\
Firefox ena woodi mo kaɓirɗi beelni dognooji Android. Ndee winndannde hollirta ko hol no aawtortee e hol no loowirtee tee ena hollira baɗɗiiɗe kaɓirgol leslese.\
1. Ngam aawtaade e loowde Firefox e kaɓirgol maa yah to firefox.com/m ndobo-ɗaa e butoŋ aawtagol.\
• Jaaɓal Android Market ngal maa uddit hello aawtirgo Firefox. Tappu heen tan ngam loowde kisa njaɓaa jamirooje ɗee.\
\
• Ko ena abboo e 17MB boowal mooftirgal SD walla ndernderal. Ɓuri waawde dogde ko e kaɓirɗi jogiiɗi so famɗii 512MB RAM.\

So Firefox horiima yiyteede tuma nde etaa aawteede walla yiileede e Android Market, kaɓirgol maa maa taw tammbitaaka. Ƴeew Will Firefox work on my mobile device? ngam heɓde humpito baɗte kaɓirɗi tammbitaaɗi.
\
Firefox mo Maemo nattii haŋkadi woode.\

A weltanaama e ɓeenugol ƴeewndo adanngo haa njeeti-ɗaa ngoo hello. Taaɓon ɗiɗon tan keed-maa e yantude e doggol wallitorde renndo amen daraningol wallude yimɓe haa keɓa humpito ɓurngo sellude e Fiirefox. Heddii tan ko sosde konte e ɓamde feere no mballir-ɗaa.\
Udditde konte ena hokku-maa hakke naatde jaabaade naamne e taƴtaade binndanɗe, tee maa wallu-min rewindaade e jaarde-ma e golle ballitte maa.\

2. Ballal maa ena waawi jogaade ɗii sifaaji !

\

Yantu e Konu Yontaaɓe amen

\
Aɗa horsini Firefox tee aɗa jogii yaajeende seeɗa? Wallu huutorɓe Firefox woɗɓe e Twitter! Ena jirwi, kadi so a meeɗi a woppataa! Kala wediiɓe twitte maa njiy heen malu!\

Sifaa goɗɗo jaawɗo, beeɓɗo no mballirtaa! Sar ganndal maa Firefox so joopaanaade yimɓe binndanɗe ballal e hokkude ɗum'en peeje ñawndugol caɗeele keeraniiɗe naamne maɓɓe. Oo sahaa min ɓuri hatojinde ko e yimɓe jogiiɓe Firefox e Android e Jaɓɓorgo Firefox.\

Ɓeydu Ganndal e Ruttorde ndee

\

So a ɗa hatojini e winndude e jannginde, ɓeydude ganndal maa e Ruttorde Ganndal ndee ko feere mawnde no mballir-ɗaa ujunnaaje neɗɗo yontere kala. Oo sahaa, min katojini ko e wallitooɓe saatotooɓe Ruttorde Ganndal Pulaar-Fulfulde ndee e ƴeewtotooɓe e Linux.\

Nokkuɗin Ballal Firefox

\
Waɗtu Ruttorde Ganndal ndee e ɗemngal maa ngam wallude en haa wallitorde Firefox ɓeydoo huuɓde! Oo sahaa, ena hatojinaa e firooɓe e ɗemngal Pulaar-Fulfulde.\

Ballal Firefox, ena anndiraa kadi SUMO (waccoore ndee ummi ko e URL, SUpport.MOzilla.org), wonaa tan nokku mo yimɓe ngarata ɗaɓɓude ballal, ko renndo walwalɓe jeyaaɓe e nokkuuji winndere ndee kala . Caggal gollodaade e huutorɓe Firefox, amin ngollodoo kadi e goomuuji goɗɗi wano Quality Assurance ngam waɗde haa caɗeele goodɗe fof ena ndoɓinndee, ñawndee ko yaajtii. Amin ngollodoo kadi e topotooɓe Firefox ngam ɓeydude moƴƴugol Firefox. Meet the Team e hello Duttugol Wuneeji lowre amen.\
Amin njiɗi habrondirde e maa sahaa kala! Aɗa jogii miijooji nafooji Ballal Firefox: naamne baɗte wallude, walla tan ɓeydude ganndaondiral men?\
• Jakkaa Wallitooɓe: Ɗoo ko nokku gadano mo min njjewtata baɗte kala ko toɗɗii Ballal Firefox. \

• Calol IRC #sumol: Feere moƴƴere no njeewtir-ɗaa e wallitooɓe woɗɓe. Maa taw ɗoon gollotooɓe e Ballal Firefox: David Tenser (djst), Cheng Wang (Cww), Ibai Garcia (Ibai), Michelle Luna (michelleluna), Kadir Topal (Topal), Michael Verdi (verdi), Matthew Middleton (zzxc) Madalina Ana (madalina) and Rosana Ardila (rosana). So a alaa kiliyaan IRC, seŋo e Mibbit.\
• Blog Wallitorde Firefox (SUMO): kesɗitine e joljole cakkitiiɗe ko ɗoon njjewtetee.\
Waasataa tawa a tarii ɗoo this blog post walla ɗoo this Google Toolbar help article, wonde Palal Kuutorɗe Google ngal nattii jaaɓdude e Firefox. Nee winndannde famminta ko peeje no ɗum ñawndiraa.\

Table of Contents

  • 1 Hol no keɓirtu-mi Maantore am Google?
  • 2 How can I add other Google Toolbar features to Firefox?
  • 3 Other solutions and alternatives
\
Ngam heɓde maantore maa Google, yah to www.google.com/bookmarks. So a heɓii toon, aɗa waawi jiggitaade maantoɗe ɗee kisa njiggo-ɗaa e Firefox so a yiɗii: \
1. Dobo e jokkol Jiggito maantore ngol e banngɗe nano, ndanndaa-ɗe e biro maa. \
• Kisa ndewaa e tinndinoje gonɗe e Jiggaade maantore inɗe e fiilde HTML ngam naatnude-ɗe e Firefox.\

Ƴoƴre: Aɗa waawi heɓde maantore maa Firefox iwde e ordinateer kala huutoraade Firefox Sync. Yah to How do I set up Sync on my computer? ngam humpitaade no ɗum teeltortee.
\

How can I add other Google Toolbar features to Firefox?

\
Actually, many Google Toolbar features are already built into Firefox. Here's a list of them with suggestions for add-ons to replace others:\

Note: See Find and install add-ons to add features to Firefox for help with installing add-ons.
\
• Search with popular suggestions - Use the Search bar in Firefox that includes Use popular search suggestions in the Firefox Search bar (built-in)\

• Access websites with a single click - Bookmarks Toolbar - Display your favorite websites at the top of the Firefox window, Library window or Bookmarks sidebar depending on the way they are displayed (built-in)\
• Contribute to any webpage with Sidewiki - Google has decided to discontinue Sidewiki. See this blog post.\
• Check your spelling - How do I use the Firefox spell checker? (built-in)\
• Translate websites into more than 40 languages - use a translation extension\
• Complete forms with AutoFill - Control whether Firefox automatically fills in forms (built-in)\
• Customize your Toolbar - Customize Firefox controls, buttons and toolbars (built-in)\
• Save Toolbar settings to your Google Account - How do I set up Sync on my computer? using a Firefox Sync account (built-in)\
• Find in page - Press Ctrl + Fcommand + F. For more, see How to search the contents of the current page for text or links.\
• Page sharing - Consider using other add-ons for sharing.\
• Site thumbnails on a new tab - Try out some of the other add-ons for generating tab preview.\
• Some Firefox users report that Googlebar Lite is a suitable replacement for the Google Toolbar.\
A jaaraama e ballital maa e lowre support. mozilla. org (SUMO) ! Ko Alla e tiiɗnaare maa min mbaawata addude ballal feewde e huutorɓe Firefox heewɓe.\

\
• It was a short meeting but a lot of celebration!\
• Everyone: please help us in testing Persona\
• We have a list with the top contributors of all time, check the etherpad or watch the video to see it! We had a nice celebration!\
• Update on the buddy program and on our Summit planned to unite all SUMO warriors!\
• Contributors of the week: AlicyWyman, philipp, john99, italian team\

• Next SUMO meeting - Monday, Sept. 30th - (call in details & meeting notes) at 9:00 am PST. Please add your comments, questions and updates to the etherpad. You can also participate in #sumo during the meeting. We’re going to record and post a video of the meeting.\
Yah to hello Jaambareeɓe ena coklaa! ngoo ngam fuɗɗaade ko yaawi walla yiylo e binndanɗe gonɗe to Hol no ngaddirtaa ballal ɗee fof no ndiidorinoo. \
• Ballitoowo nokkuɗinal L10N - Wallu-en firde Ballal Firefoxp e loowdi mum e ɗemngal maa.\
• Ballitoowo Jakkaa - Jaabo naamne ballital huutorɓe ɓurɗe naamneede tawa njaabaaka tawo.\
• Wallitorde Duttine - Tar tee tonngaa duttine huutorɓe gonɗe e jakkaa wallitorde huutorɓe e naatne ngam faamnde ko caɗeele ɗee ngoni kisa kesɗitinaa winndannde Jaŋtol Wallitorde Huutorɓe ndee.\
• Nokkuɗinoowo Duttine - Tar tee tonngaa duttine garɗe e ɗemngal maa fof kisa kesɗitinaa winndannde Jaŋtol Wallitorde Huutorɓe ndee.\
• Ballitoowo Kony Yontaaɓe - Jaabo twitte baɗte Firefox\
• Taƴtotooɗo RG - Wallu-en hesɗitinde binndanɗe cokluɗe wayleede e ruttorde ganndal ndee\
Sabu ko min fedde peñcu, kala ko min ngollii, min mbayyinat e renndo ngoo, etee aza waawi yiyde no golle ɗee njahrata yeeso.\
• Payndaale amen lebbitatiire fof maa kumpite ko min ngoni e dow mum e nder lebbi tati garooji.\
No min keewi waɗirde nih, ko huutoraade\
Bugzilla ngam raddude bugge e ɗaɓɓitanɗe moƴƴitingol.  \
• So won ko feeaani e SUMO, tiiɗno tintin-min mbele min ñawndaèɗum ko yaajtii. Hokku min tan tonngol daɓɓol e cifol daɓɓol caɗeele ɗee. \
• Aɗa waawi yirlaade e doggol bugge cakkitiiɗe jaŋteede e bugge cakkitiiɗe ñawndeede ngam yiyde caɗeele ɗe min ndaddata. \
Caggal carworɗe amen jeñtorɗe to support.mozilla.org, amin njogii carworɗe ɗiɗi daawnirɗe ceertuɗe ngam ƴeewdo:\

• support-dev.allizom.org - AKA "-dev" - Ena hesɗitina sahaa kala iwde e catal amen 'baabawal', wadde ko dokkol cakkitiingol dogata heen. Tiiɗno eto ƴeewtaade bugge ɗoon hade maa naatnude jaŋtol. So tawii ɗe ñawndaama, maa yiy ɗum ɗoo. \

• support.allizom.org - AKA "stage" - Ɗoo heewi hesɗitintee ko ñalnde Njaslaare hedde waktu 16:00 kikiiɗe (Waktu GMT), hay so ndee ena heewi ko naatnata kesɗitine, nde dognata ko dokkol ngal min ɗaminii naatnude e daawal jeñtorgal amen garowal. So won bayle mbaɗ-ɗaa aɗa yiɗi ƴeewtaade no yaltirta, tiiɗno ƴeewto ɗum e ndee sarworde tawo.\
So aɗa yiɗi heɓe kesɗitine baɗte bayle e hello, dobo e jokkol tiitagol Neldu am iimeel so ndee winndannde waylaama gonngol e palal sawndo ñaamo ngal.\

Batu Yontere: Amin njogii batu yontere kala ngam yeewtude e dille amen cakkitiiɗe. Batu nguu waɗata ko Aaɓnde sahnga 16:00 GMT. Ngoo hello waɗi ko humpito noddugol e tonngol batuuji ɗii. Aɗa waawi ɓeydude miijooji, naamnde e kesɗitine maa e wiki hee. Aɗa waawi kadi naatde e yeewtere #sumo tuma batu nguu. \

Batuuji IRC Lewriije: ma min mbaɗ batuuji irc lewriiji to #sumomeet IRC (via Mibbit). Batuuji IRC ɗii mbaɗata ko Naasaande adannde e lewru kala tee maa yeewtere ndee ɗakke to taƴre wallitooɓe e jakkaa oo. \

Min kuutortoo ko Jakkaa wallitooɓe ngam yeewtude kala ko toɗɗii Ballal Firefox. Aɗa waawi yiyde heewɓe e amen to calol IRC (via Mibbit) ngam yeewtiide e amen. Amin kuutoroo kadi jokkol bataake cuuriiɗo e keftinirɗe amen ngam neldude ɓatakuuje keeriiɗe huutoraade SUMO.\
Fooɗtude (e fanndinde) wallitooɓe hesɓe waawi gasde tan ko e jokkondiral e ekkondiral hakkunde neɗɗo e neɗɗo. \

Amin njogani-maa laabi keewɗi ngam jokkondirde e hohooɓe SUMO e mbaydi keeriindi ngam ɗaɓɓude ɗowtal. Caggal keftinirɗe amen, amin njogii yeewtere jakkaa innitagol wallitooɓe. Amin mbasiyoo-on binnditagol e Mozillians.org tee ɓeydon taggere SUMO e heftinirde mon. \
Ndee-ɗoo haatumeere waɗi ko jokke fayde to pelle gonɗe e eɓɓoore SUMO ndee, ko toon tawataa hohooɓe pelle ɗee e wallitooɓe ɓee.\
Kala e mon balluɗo kuutoro jeyaa ko e wallitooɓe, tee amin ñaagii nde tiiɗtinton aadi hakkunde men so ena nawanii-on.\
• Wallu huutorɓe no siforaa e winndannde Hol no ngaddirtaa ballal ndee\
• Dobo Neldu am ɓatakuru so ndee winndannde waylaama e ngoo hello ngam tarde kesɗtine Kabaruuji ɗee\
• Anndin mawɗo goomu maa so won caɗeele kaɗ-maa addude ballal ngoowno-ɗaa addude\
Mawɓe feede ɓee ena naamnaa gaadondire goɗɗe.\
• Hesɗitin Jaŋtol ngonka SUMO wonande goomu maa yontere kala\
• Tawtore ann e hoore maa kawte ɗe Mozilla yuɓɓinta duuɓi ɗiɗi kala\

Jooni so mi horiima ɗooftaade gaadondire am noon?

\
Heewɓe e wallitooɓe SUMO ko walwalɓe jogiiɓe haajuuji goɗɗi baawɗi haɗde ɗumen ɗooftaade ko ngaadondiraa. So ɗum heɓii-ma, amin njogii wasiyaaji o ɗum safrortoo:\
• Siiftor, a wonaa gooto e golle ɗee. Ɗum heɓii heewɓe e men. Hay gooto felataa-ma walla ñiŋ-maa sabu maaɗa horaade waɗde ko mbaɗatno-ɗaa..\

• Ɓamtu daande, humpit renndo ngoo. Ɓuri moƴƴude ko pamminaa goomu maa caɗe njogi-ɗaa, maa weeɓnan gooto e maɓɓe kala. SUMO iko nokku jokkere enɗam, aɗa waawi heɓde ballal ɓurgal ɗamawu maa, kono maa kumpitaa goomu maa so caɗeele kaɗii-ma gollaade, no ɓuri yaawrude fof, ko noon ɓuri..\

• Bayle e ngonka maa duumotaako. So a yiɗii hoytinde golle maa lebbi seeɗa, ena newii haa wooroo. So a hebiima kadi ɓeydude golle, ma en ngollodo kadi e weytaare. Dartinde golle jooni firtaani a waawaa artude e goomu wallitooɓe maa so ngonka maa wayliima.\
• Boni tan ko deƴƴere. Yahde tan majja woni ko ɓuri bonde. Sabu goomu maa addaa so yiyloto goɗɗo walla alaa, ko waawi wonde fof, tintin-min ngam min mbaawa wallude.\

Kala nde cos-ɗaa tabbere hesere, Firefox hollat lowe maa dowrowe ngam weeɓtinde naatde e majje. Ma min kollu-ma hol no lowe peŋirtee e ngoo hello, leemtude lelngo ngoo walla nih uddude ɗum so a yiɗii..\

Tesko: Ndee winndannde toɗɗaaki yamere maa Firefox. Ena naamnii yamre Beta Firefox sakkitiinde heɓotoonde ɗoo mozilla.org/beta.
\

  • 2 Hol no uddirtu-mi hello tabbe ngoo?
\

Hol no lelnirtu-mi lowe am dowrowe e hello tabbere hesere ndee?

\
Aɗa waawi feŋde, momtude walla leemtude lowe jaltooje e hello tabbere hesere.\
<ul><li>A doboto tan e maandel cettel gonngel e lobbudu dow bannge ñaamo lowre ndee ngam daaƴde-nde e deen dartorde e hello ngoo. .\
\
<ul><li>Dobo e "X" gonɗo e lobbudu dow bannge ñaamo ngam momtude hello ngoo.\
\
<ul><li>Dobo, ndaasaa lowre fayde ɗo njiɗ-ɗaa kala. So tawii lowre ndee "feŋanooka" tawo, ma nde feŋo ɗoon.\
\
\
\
So a yiɗaa yiyde lowe dowrowe ɗee tuma nde cosèɗaa tabbere hesere, aɗa waawi suuɗde-ɗe no weeɓiri:\
<ul><li>dobo e butoŋ gonɗo lobbudu dow bannge ñaamo hello ngoo ngam uddude/hollude hello tabbe heso ngoo..\
\
\
\
So tawii aɗa hulani suturo maa, aɗa waawi nih uddude ɗum kisa:\
1. In the address bar, type about:config and press EnterReturn.\
• The about:config "This might void your warranty!" warning page may appear. Click I'll be careful, I promise!I accept the risk! to continue to the about:config page.\
• Dobo ɗiɗol e cuɓe url browser.newtab.kisa mbaylaa about:newtabwonta about:blank\
• Dobo {butoŋ OK} ngam uddude tabbere about:config ndee.\

Njaajeendi Yaynirde ko fannu Firefox nafoowu jaytinde lowe e yaynirde ndee fof haa heewa, ko nafoore so njogi-ɗaa ko jaynirgel tokosel wano notebook, kisa Tele maa HD ɓeydoo welde yeeɓde walla tan yiɗde yiyde ko mawni!o!\

Tesko: Mbayka Njaajeendi Yaynirde Firefox jiidaani e njaajeendi yaynirde jaaɓnirgal naatnangal e Mac OS X 10.7 (Lion). Firefox jaaɓdaani e mbayka njaajeendi yaynirde yuɓɓo Lion.
\
Ko mawni ɓuri! Hebbin yaynirde maa fof huutoraade Firefox.\
1. E palal dosi ngal, dobo e View dosol.\

So palal dosi ngal ena hollaa (ko woowaa e Windows XP) Linux) dobo View ndobo-ɗaa kisa Full Screen.
\
Artiran am ordinateer am! Famɗitin Firefox haa fota e ɓetol mum gadanol.\
<ol><li>Naw jamngel maa to dow yaynirde ndee.\
• Cdobo e maandel Njaajeendi Yaynirde ngel. \
<ol><li>Naw jamngel maa to dow yaynirde ndee.\
Woodande onon waawɓe teskaade. Jaytin e Njaajeendi Yaynirde huutoraade tappirde maa.\
Sodorɗe tappirde Njaajeendi Yaynirde : Tappu e ñiire F11 ndee.\

Tesko: E ordinateeruuji jogiiɗe tappirɗe ɗe timmaani (wano netbukke and laptoppe) fiy e ñiiƴe fn + F11 .
\
Sodorɗe tappirde Njaajeendi Yaynirde: command + Shift + F\
Ɗee binndanɗe maa mballe faamde Firefox e nder kaɓirgol maa Android, ngam heɓde pamminorɗe aafgol, yah to Aawtagol e aafgol Firefox mo cinndel.\
• ASA Firefox Android\
• Fuuɗo huutoraade Firefox mo Cinndel\
• Tinndinooje Firefox mo Android\
• Fuuɗo huutoraade wanngorde Firefox mo taable Android\
Daartorde wanngorde Firefox mo cinndel. e taable peɗeeli 7 nana sifaa e natal gonngal les ɗoo.\
Firefox ko wanngorde geese yaawnde, weeɓtunde e hisnde wonndunde e eɓɓoore: mahde enternet ɓurɗo yuɓɓude tee waɗan maa wanngorde lobbere.\

Jiggo, danndit, syncko teelte maa e maantore maa

\
Jiggaade maantore e keɓe goɗɗe iwde e banngorɗe goɗɗe\
Jiggaade maantore iwɗe e Google Chrome\
Jiggaade labaaɗe e keɓe goɗɗe iwɗe e Internet Explorer\
Hol no maantore e teelte synckortee hakkunde ordinateeruuji\
Hol no syncirtu-mi maantore e teelte hakkunde ordinateer e kaɓirɗi beelno\
Yiy maantore e tabbe maa e iPhone, iPod e iPad\
Jiggaade maantore iwɗe e fiilde HTML\
Jiggitaade maantore iwɗe e fiilde HTML\
Dannditaade e artirde maantore\
Ɗee binndanɗe kollat-maa ko kaɓirɗi jaaɓduɗe e Firefox mo cinndel e hol no aafirtee huutoraade Google Play.\
• Mbar Firefox ena jaaɓdi e kaɓirgol cinndol am?\
• Hol no aafrat-mi Firefox e kaɓirgol cinndol am?\

Ƴeew Hol no Jaɓɓorgo Firefox teeltortee e iPhone maa ngam heɓde tinndinooje.\

Hol ko hesɗi e Firefox mo cinndel?

\
• ASA Firefox mo Android\
Dobo OK ngam uddude henorde Cuɓe ndeeDoboClosengam uddude henorde Cuɓoraaɗe ndeeUddu henorde Cuɓoraaɗe ndee\

To dow henorde Firefox ndee, dobo e butoŋ Firefox (dosol Kuutorɗe e Windows XP) kisa ndobo-ɗaa e CuɓeE palal dosi ngal, dobo e dosol Firefox tee labo-ɗaa Cuɓoraaɗe...To dow henorde Firefox ndee, dobo e dosol Taƴto tee labo-ɗaa CuɓoraaɗeTo dow henorde Firefox ndee, dobo e dosol Kuutorɗe tee labo-ɗaa Cuɓe...E palal dosi ngal, dobo e dosol Firefox tee labo-ɗaa Cuɓoraaɗe...To dow henorde Firefox nde, dobo e dosol Taƴto tee labo-ɗaa Cuɓoraaɗe...\
Tesko: Ndee winndannde toɗɗaaki yamere maa Firefox. Ena naamnii yamre {{{channel}}} Firefox sakkitiinde heɓotoonde ɗoo mozilla.org/{{{slug}}}.
So aɗa hesɗitina yamre ɓennunde Firefox, yah to Kesɗitingol Firefox.\

Dobo e yuɓɓo huumnungo njiɗ-ɗaa aafde Firefox.

Hol no loowirtu-mi Firefox e kaɓirgol beelnol?\
\
Hol no Jaɓɓorgo Firefox teeltortee e iPhone maa\

Apple ena suri-min e waawde saakde Firefox mo kaɓirɗi iOS (iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch), kono aɗa waawi aafde Jaɓɓorgo Firefox , jaaɓngal dokkal nafowal heɓde tabbe, maantore e aslol Firefox maa mo biro.

Ko a keso e Firefox mo cinndel?

\
• Hol no aafitu-mi Firefox e kaɓirgol beelnol?\
• Fuɗɗo huutoraade Firefox mo cinndel\
• Fuɗɗo huutoraade Firefox mo wanngorde taable Android\
• Hol no keɓirtu-mi Ɓeyditte mi aafa?\
• Mbar Firefox ena jaaɓdi e kaɓirgol am beelnol?\
• Firefox mo cinndel jaaɓdaani e Flash\
• Hol ko waɗi Firefox mo cinndel leelirde nih?\
• Hol no mbaɗirtu-mi sync hakkunde Firefox biro e cinndel am?\
• Hol no momtitu-mi alsol cakkitiingol e e taable am?\
So a horiima yiytude jaabawol cokluno-ɗaa, renndo amen wallitooɓe ena kebii wallude-ma yiytude feere. Weddo ɗoo naamnal maa.\
\
Amin njogii renndo yarlitiiɓe ngam wallude-ma yiytude peeje ñawndooje caɗeele maa. Tiiɗno fammin-en caɗeele ɗee haa timma tawa aɗa sifii haa laaɓi ngati maa heɓ iimeel so won njaabiiɗo naamnal maa.\
